description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Pork Mince With Golden Tofu recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spiced Pork Mince With Golden Tofu Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut tofu into 3cm squares, 1cm thick. Dust lightly with flour shaking off excess. Heat 1/4 cup of the oil in a wok or deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook tofu for about 1 minute each side or until crisp and lightly golden. Transfer to a paper towel lined plate. Set aside.
Heat half the remaining oil and cook mince with chilli, in 2 batches over high heat for about 6-8 minutes. Transfer to a bowl.

Add onion, garlic and ginger to the wok and toss over medium heat for 3 minutes, or until softened. Add coriander and cumin and cook for 1 minute. Return pork to wok, add beans and cook for 4 minutes or until just tender.
Add spinach and mushrooms to the wok. Combine hoisin sauce and 11/2 tbs water, add to wok and toss to combine. Cook for 4 minutes. Serve tofu topped with mince mixture, coriander and fried shallots.
